name: Heatmap

slots.name: axisLine
slots.description: Custom component for the axis main line.

slots.name: axisTick
slots.description: Custom component for the axis tick.

slots.name: cell
slots.description: The component that renders the heatmap cell.

slots.name: exportIcon
slots.description: Icon displayed on the toolbar's export button.

slots.name: loadingOverlay
slots.description: Overlay component rendered when the chart is in a loading state.

slots.name: noDataOverlay
slots.description: Overlay component rendered when the chart has no data to display.

slots.name: zoomInIcon
slots.description: Icon displayed on the toolbar's zoom in button.

slots.name: zoomOutIcon
slots.description: Icon displayed on the toolbar's zoom out button.

classes.description: Styles applied to the cell element if faded.
Styles applied to the cell element if highlighted.

Styles applied to the root element for a specified series.
Needs to be suffixed with the series ID: `.${heatmapClasses.series}-${seriesId}`.
